title: AgentPay - Payments Infra for Agents
description:
I cherish perfection and beauty. But I've come to understand the former to be the enemy of progress, without which the latter is unachievable. That's why I'm introducing AgentPay today.

AgentPay consists of: 
✅ A JavaScript Merchant SDK for websites to accept payments from AI agents 
✅ A Python Agent SDK for AI agents to make and accept payments 
✅ A secure payment processing backend with end-to-end encryption 

Our SDKs will be open-sourced.
